from datetime import datetime
import sys

date1 = datetime.now()
date2 = date1.strftime("%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S+00:00")

properties.body:
Hello,

This is a notification from SecureX

A new domain has been blocked by Cisco Umbrella

Domain : $activity.definition_activity_01UAZNJIH2E8Q0MwSDE04lJVGkUuq4UyYuv.input.source_array[@].destination$
properties.subject: Cisco Umbrella - New Domain Blocked

This is a notification from SecureX

A domain already seen in this organization has been blocked by Cisco Umbrella

Domain : $activity.definition_activity_01UAZNJIH2E8Q0MwSDE04lJVGkUuq4UyYuv.input.source_array[@].destination$
properties.subject: Cisco Umbrella - Domain Blocked
